item.title: 澳大利亚立法禁止青少年使用社交媒体后，还得想办法强制执行
item.description: 一些欧盟国家和美国各州规定了社交媒体的年龄限制，但缺乏执行力度。【原文：Some EU countries and US states set age limits for social media but lack enforcement.】

item.title: 澳大利亚通过 16 岁以下儿童社交媒体禁令
item.description: 该法预计将于 2025 年 11 月生效，它设定了一些世界上最严格的社交媒体控制措施，并将迫使平台采取合理措施，确保年龄验证保护措施到位。【原文：The law, expected to take effect in November 2025, sets some of the toughest social media controls in the world and will force platforms to take reasonable steps to ensure age-verification protections are in place.】

item.title: 尽管特朗普发出关税威胁，美国银行仍看好墨西哥 "近岸外包 "带来的长期增长
item.description: 美国银行墨西哥分行负责人表示，美国银行看好在墨西哥的发展前景，即使在美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁对出口到美国的产品征收关税之后，美国银行仍将从所谓的 "近岸外包 "趋势中获益。【原文：Bank of America is bullish on its future in Mexico, according to the head of the bank's unit in the country, and stands to benefit from the so-called "nearshoring" trend even after threats of tariffs on exports to the U.S. by President-elect Donald Trump.】

item.title: 信实集团美国分公司斥资 1200 万美元收购氦气勘探公司 Wavetech Helium 的股份
item.description: 信实工业集团（Reliance Industries）周四表示，该集团的美国子公司以 1200 万美元收购了美国氦气生产公司 Wavetech Helium 21% 的股份，此举旨在扩大其低碳能源部门。【原文：Reliance Industries' U.S. unit has bought a 21% stake in U.S.-based helium production company Wavetech Helium for $12 million, the conglomerate said on Thursday, in a move aimed at expanding its low-carbon energy segment.】

item.title: 美国人感恩节用手机购物，沙发成为购买点
item.description: 今年感恩节，美国假日购物者大有利用小屏幕抢占先机的计划，零售商花了几周时间为他们做铺垫，在 "黑色星期五 "之前在网上兜售从电视、玩具到蓝牙扬声器等各种商品的折扣。【原文：U.S. holiday shoppers have big plans to use small screens for a head start this year on Thanksgiving Day, and retailers have spent weeks priming them, touting pre-Black Friday online discounts for everything from TVs and toys to Bluetooth speakers.】

item.title: 特朗普上台一个月后，世界市场面临现实考验
item.description: 11 月是唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）11 月 5 日赢得美国大选后胜负分明的一个月。【原文：November was a month of clear winners and losers from Donald Trump's Nov. 5 U.S. election victory.】

item.title: 中国警告称，如果美国升级芯片限制，将采取 "必要行动
item.description: 在有报道称拜登政府可能最快于本周公布新的出口限制措施后，中国周四警告说，如果美国升级芯片控制措施，中国将采取 "必要行动 "保护中国企业。【原文：China warned on Thursday it would take "necessary actions" to protect Chinese firms if the U.S. escalated chip control measures, following reports that the Biden administration could unveil new export restrictions as soon as this week.】

item.title: 工会称，联合信贷银行竞购 BPM 银行引发对劳动力的担忧
item.description: 银行业的主要工会周四表示，联合信贷银行（UniCredit）对 Banco BPM 的竞购令人担忧该交易对就业的潜在影响。【原文：UniCredit's bid for Banco BPM raises concerns about the potential impact of the deal on jobs, the banking sector's main union said on Thursday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，财团的目标是在未来几周内完成对 ESR 的收购，估值可能超过 70 亿美元
item.description: 两位消息人士称，包括喜达屋资本集团（Starwood Capital Group）和华平投资集团（Warburg Pincus）在内的财团计划在未来几周内敲定将 ESR 集团私有化的交易，对这家在香港上市的房地产基金管理公司的估值将超过 70 亿美元。【原文：A consortium including Starwood Capital Group and Warburg Pincus aims to finalise a deal to take ESR Group private in the coming weeks, valuing the Hong Kong-listed real estate fund manager at over $7 billion, said two sources.】

item.title: 阿达尼全军覆没虽有损失，但不会破坏外国投资者对印度的信心
item.description: 全球投资者表示，对阿达尼集团（Adani Group）贿赂指控的担忧将在更大范围内蔓延，这将损害印度市场的情绪，但不会影响长期前景，因为他们打赌世界上表现最好的市场之一将在明年重回正轨。【原文：Worries of a wider spillover from bribery charges against the Adani Group will hurt sentiment in India but not the long-term outlook, global investors say, as they wager one of the world's best-performing markets will get back on track next year.】

item.title: 从机场到食用油：印度高塔姆-阿达尼的众多业务
item.description: 印度亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）管理着一家规模庞大的企业集团，业务范围涵盖机场建设、电力供应和食用油销售。【原文：Indian billionaire Gautam Adani oversees a sprawling conglomerate with activities spanning construction of airports to supply of electricity and the sale of cooking oil.】

item.title: 报道称，ByteDance 在人工智能漏洞案中要求实习生赔偿 110 万美元
item.description: 中国字节跳动公司（ByteDance）正在起诉一名前实习生，指控他蓄意攻击其人工智能大型语言模型训练基础设施，索赔 110 万美元。【原文：China's ByteDance is suing a former intern for $1.1 million, alleging he deliberately attacked its artificial intelligence large language model training infrastructure, a case that has drawn widespread attention within China amid a heated AI race.】

item.title: 据报道，美国对中国芯片的限制措施可能与提案相去甚远，ASML 和同行因此反弹
item.description: 据彭博新闻社报道，拜登政府对中国芯片的限制措施可能没有预期的那么严厉，ASML 及其欧洲计算机芯片设备行业的同行股价周四攀升。【原文：Shares of ASML and its peers in the European computer chip equipment sector climbed on Thursday after Bloomberg News reported that the Biden administration's China chip curbs could be less severe than expected.】

item.title: 德国电信公司与 AWS 合作在试点项目中测试量子技术
item.description: 德国电信（Telefonica）和亚马逊网络服务公司（AWS）的高管表示，两家公司正在开展一项试点工作，在电信运营商的移动网络中测试量子技术。【原文：Telefonica Germany and Amazon Web Services (AWS) are working on a pilot to test quantum technologies in the telecom operator's mobile network, executives from the two companies said.】

item.title: 海德堡材料公司 6 亿美元收购美国巨人水泥公司
item.description: 海德堡材料公司（Heidelberg Materials）周四表示，已达成以 6 亿美元收购美国巨人水泥控股公司（Giant Cement Holding）及其子公司的协议，这是该德国公司为扩大其在美国的立足点而进行的最新一次收购。【原文：Heidelberg Materials has struck a deal to buy U.S. company Giant Cement Holding and its subsidiaries for $600 million, it said on Thursday, the latest acquisition by the German company to expand its foothold in the United States.】

item.title: 日产汽车 10 月除墨西哥外全球产量下降，但特朗普关税威胁迫在眉睫
item.description: 日产汽车公司周四表示，由于除墨西哥以外的大多数生产中心都出现了减产，10月份全球产量连续第五个月下降。【原文：Nissan Motor said on Thursday its global production fell for a fifth straight month in October, led by downshifts at most of its manufacturing hubs except for Mexico.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁征收关税，英国制定棘手的贸易路线
item.description: 英国将致力于说服唐纳德-特朗普，英国与美国以服务业为主的贸易应能躲过最严重的关税影响，同时英国也将谨慎地修复与欧盟的关系，并培养与中国的商业联系。【原文：Britain will aim to convince Donald Trump its services-dominated trade with the United States should escape the worst of tariffs even as it cautiously repairs ties with the European Union and nurtures commercial links with China.】

item.title: 早间竞标：法国预算和德国价格成为焦点
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 丰田汽车 10 月份全球产量连续第九个月下降
item.description: 受美国和中国产量大幅下降的拖累，丰田汽车 10 月份的全球产量连续第九个月下降，但与前几个月相比，降幅不大。【原文：Toyota Motor's global output dropped for a ninth consecutive month in October, dragged lower by big falls in production in the United States and China but the decline was mild compared to previous months.】

item.title: 美国汽油库存跳增，石油走低，欧佩克+供应决定成焦点
item.description: 油价在周四的亚洲交易中走低，此前美国汽油库存在感恩节假期前意外飙升，引发了人们对汽车燃料第一大消费国需求的担忧。【原文：Oil prices edged lower in Asian trading on Thursday, after a surprise jump in U.S. gasoline stocks ahead of the nation's Thanksgiving holiday sparked worry over demand in the top consumer of the motor fuel.】

item.title: 在对新贸易战的担忧中，中国国营媒体赞扬一些美国公司
item.description: 中国的国有媒体赞扬了一些美国公司的 "强强合作"--这是在人们担心贸易战的背景下发表的评论，不禁让人想起唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）就任第一任总统期间，中国报纸是如何报道与美国的紧张关系的。【原文：China's state media have praised some U.S. firms for "strong collaboration" - commentary that comes amid fears of a trade war and is reminiscent of how tensions with the U.S. were covered by Chinese newspapers during Donald Trump's first presidency.】

item.title: 美国感恩节前，亚洲股市低迷，美元走软
item.description: 周四，亚洲股市低迷，美元处于守势，因为美国数据显示，即使经济仍有韧性，但通胀放缓的进展已经停滞，这引发了人们对美联储明年可能采取的路径的疑虑。【原文：Asian shares were subdued on Thursday and the dollar was on the defensive after U.S. data showed progress in slowing inflation had stalled even as the economy remained resilient, raising doubt over the path the Federal Reserve could take next year.】

item.title: 亚马逊开发视频人工智能模型，The Information 报道
item.description: 据 The Information 周三报道，亚马逊开发了新的生成式人工智能，除文本外，还能处理图像和视频。【原文：Amazon has developed new generative artificial intelligence that can process images and video in addition to text, The Information reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 阿达尼的指控凸显了印度推动清洁能源发展的决心
item.description: 针对阿达尼集团（Adani Group）创始人高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）的贿赂指控凸显了印度可再生能源开发商在为其生产的电力寻找买家方面面临的日益严重的问题。【原文：Bribery allegations against Adani Group founder Gautam Adani have highlighted the growing problem India's renewable energy developers face in finding buyers for the power they generate.】

item.title: 英特尔 78.6 亿美元补贴交易限制其制造部门的出售
item.description: 英特尔周三表示，其获得 78.6 亿美元美国政府补贴的交易限制了该公司在其芯片制造部门成为独立实体后出售股份的能力。【原文：Intel said on Wednesday its deal for $7.86 billion in U.S. government subsidies restricts the company's ability to sell stakes in its chipmaking unit if it becomes an independent entity.】

item.title: 澳大利亚就业市场火热，降息遥遥无期
item.description: 澳大利亚世界领先的劳动力市场是阻碍该国央行与全球同行一道扭转数十年来最激进的政策紧缩周期的主要障碍之一。【原文：Australia's world-beating labour market is one of the main obstacles stopping the country's central bank from joining global peers in reversing the most aggressive policy tightening cycle in decades.】

item.title: 欧元跳水，日元升值，美元受阻
item.description: 在一位央行决策者发表鹰派言论后，欧元周四继续保持四个月来的最大涨幅，而日元则因越来越多的人认为日本可能在12月加息而创下三个月来最强劲的一周。【原文：The euro clung to its sharpest rise in four months on Thursday following hawkish remarks from a central bank policymaker, while the yen powered toward its strongest week in three months on growing bets Japan could hike interest rates in December.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，贝莱德已达成收购私人信贷管理公司 HPS 的协议
item.description: 据《金融时报》周三报道，贝莱德已就收购私人信贷集团 HPS Investment Partners 达成握手协议。【原文：BlackRock has a handshake deal to buy private credit group HPS Investment Partners, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 分析师警告：特朗普拟对加拿大征收关税将推高油价
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）承诺对加拿大征收关税，分析师们周三表示，这将推高美国人的燃油价格，因为这将颠覆几十年来美国第一大原油供应国的石油贸易。【原文：U.S. President-elect Donald Trump's pledge to impose tariffs on Canada would drive up fuel prices for Americans as it would upend decades-old oil trade from its top crude supplier, analysts said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 在关税威胁下，美国批发商发出警告：人们会付出代价
item.description: 当洛杉矶大多数人还在睡梦中时，58 岁的梅尔基亚德斯-弗洛雷斯（Melquiades Flores）凌晨 1 点就开始了一天的工作，在他于 2019 年创办的批发商 M&M 番茄和智利公司（M&M Tomatoes and Chile Company）监督农产品卸货。【原文：While most of Los Angeles sleeps, 58-year-old Melquiades Flores starts his day at 1 a.m., supervising the unloading of produce at M&M Tomatoes and Chile Company, the wholesaler he started in 2019.】
